summary.span: Fornece métodos de utilitário para compor e analisar objetos URI de pacote.

span.span: Provides utility methods to compose and parse pack URI objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int ComparePackUri (Uri firstPackUri, Uri secondPackUri);
.method public static hidebysig int32 ComparePackUri(class System.Uri firstPackUri, class System.Uri secondPackUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function ComparePackUri (firstPackUri As Uri, secondPackUri As Uri) As Integer
public: static int ComparePackUri(Uri ^ firstPackUri, Uri ^ secondPackUri);
static member ComparePackUri : Uri * Uri -> int

summary.span: Retorna um valor que indica se os dois URI "pack://" são equivalentes.

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether two pack URIs are equivalent.

returns.span: Um inteiro com sinal que indica a relação entre e .

span.span: A signed integer indicating the relationship between and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se os dois `firstPackUri` e `secondPackUri` são `null`, retornará 0.If both `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are `null`, returns 0. Ao comparar URIs "pack://", um URI nulo é sempre menor que um URI de não-nulo.When comparing pack URIs, a null URI is always less than a non-null URI. Para casos em que `firstPackUri` e `secondPackUri` são ambos absoluto URIs "pack://", executa a comparação.For cases where `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are both absolute pack URIs, performs the comparison.

span.span: Either or is not an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

exception.span: ou não começa com um esquema "pack://".

span.span: Either or do not begin with a "pack://" scheme.

summary.span: Retorna um valor que indica se a parte [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] dos dois pacotes é equivalente.

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether two package part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] are equivalent.

returns.span: Um valor que indica a relação entre e .

span.span: A value that indicates the relationship between and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se os dois `firstPartUri` e `secondPartUri` são `null`, retornará 0.If both `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are `null`, returns 0. Ao comparar [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)], um valor nulo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] sempre é menor do que um não-nulo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].When comparing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)], a null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] is always less than a non-null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]. Para casos em que `firstPartUri` e `secondPartUri` são ambos relativo URIs, executa a comparação.For cases where `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are both relative URIs, performs the comparison.

exception.span: ou não é uma sintaxe de parte [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] válida.

span.span: or is not a valid part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] syntax.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A tabela a seguir ilustra os casos de exemplo para o método.The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`|URI de pacote retornadoReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml/%41/%61.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page5.xaml/a/page5.xaml|#summary#summary|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summarypack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| |http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null****null**|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|**null****null**|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xamlpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|#xref#xref|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xrefpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| Compor um URI de pacote é um processo de várias etapa.Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. Por exemplo, uma etapa para formar um URI de pacote é substituir os caracteres de barra invertida (/) da `packageUri` com vírgulas (,).For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). Para obter mais informações sobre conversão de cadeia de caracteres e como os URIs "pack://" são formados, consulte o Apêndice a. 4 "Exemplos de conversão de cadeia de caracteres" e o Apêndice b. 3 "Compor um URI de pacote" na especificação Open Packaging Conventions disponível para download em [especificações e Downloads de licença](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

summary.span: Cria um novo URI "pack://" que aponta para um pacote.

span.span: Creates a new pack URI that points to a package.

returns.span: O URI "pack://" para o referenciado pelo fornecido.

span.span: The pack URI for the referenced by the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` não pode ser especificado como `null` ou está vazio.`packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty. A tabela a seguir ilustra os casos de exemplo para .The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packageUri`|URI de pacote retornadoReturned pack URI| |------------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abcpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|Pack://file:,, d:,packages,mypackage2.pkgpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg| Compor um URI de pacote é um processo de várias etapa.Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. Por exemplo, uma etapa para formar um URI de pacote é substituir os caracteres de barra invertida (/) da `packageUri` com vírgulas (,).For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). Para obter mais informações sobre conversão de cadeia de caracteres e como os URIs "pack://" são formados, consulte o Apêndice a. 4 "Exemplos de conversão de cadeia de caracteres" e o Apêndice b. 3 "Compor um URI de pacote" na especificação Open Packaging Conventions disponível para download em [especificações e Downloads de licença](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o método para definir um pack URI que faz referência a um pacote.The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

summary.span: Cria um URI "pack://" dado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] e o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de uma parte do pacote.

span.span: Creates a pack URI given a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] and the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a part in the package.
The pack URI of the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` não pode ser especificado como nulo ou vazio.`packageUri` may not be specified as null or empty. Se `partUri` é `null`, o URI de pacote retornado aponta para o pacote.If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package. A tabela a seguir ilustra os casos de exemplo para o método.The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|URI de pacote retornadoReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml/%41/%61.xml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xamlpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml| Compor um URI de pacote é um processo de várias etapa.Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. Por exemplo, uma etapa para formar um URI de pacote é substituir os caracteres de barra invertida (/) da `packageUri` com vírgulas (,).For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). Para obter mais informações sobre conversão de cadeia de caracteres e como os URIs "pack://" são formados, consulte o Apêndice a. 4 "Exemplos de conversão de cadeia de caracteres" e o Apêndice b. 3 "Compor um URI de pacote" na especificação Open Packaging Conventions disponível para download em [especificações e Downloads de licença](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o método para definir um pack URI que faz referência a um pacote.The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

summary.span: Cria um URI "pack://" dado um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de uma parte do pacote e um fragmento "#" a ser acrescentado.

span.span: Creates a pack URI given a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a part in the package, and a "#" fragment to append.

returns.span: O URI de pacote que identifica o pacote especificado, a parte do pacote e o fragmento.

span.span: The pack URI that identifies the specified package, package part, and fragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` não pode ser especificado como `null` ou está vazio.`packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty. Se `partUri` é `null`, o URI de pacote retornado aponta para o pacote.If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package. `fragment` não pode ser uma cadeia de caracteres vazia, mas pode ser especificado como `null`.`fragment` cannot be an empty string but can be specified as `null`. Quando não especificado como `null`, o `fragment` cadeia de caracteres deve começar com um caractere '#'.When not specified as `null`, the `fragment` string must begin with a '#' character. Para obter mais informações da sintaxe das `fragment` referências, consulte a seção 3.5 "Fragment" de [RFC 3986](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt).For more information of the syntax of `fragment` references, see Section 3.5 "Fragment" of [RFC 3986](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt). A tabela a seguir ilustra os casos de exemplo para o método.The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`|URI de pacote retornadoReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml/%41/%61.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page5.xaml/a/page5.xaml|#summary#summary|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summarypack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| |http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null****null**|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|**null****null**|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xamlpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|#xref#xref|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xrefpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| Compor um URI de pacote é um processo de várias etapa.Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. Por exemplo, uma etapa para formar um URI de pacote é substituir os caracteres de barra invertida (/) da `packageUri` com vírgulas (,).For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). Para obter mais informações sobre conversão de cadeia de caracteres e como os URIs "pack://" são formados, consulte o Apêndice a. 4 "Exemplos de conversão de cadeia de caracteres" e o Apêndice b. 3 "Compor um URI de pacote" na especificação Open Packaging Conventions disponível para download em [especificações e Downloads de licença](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o método para definir um pack URI que faz referência a um pacote.The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

param.span: O URI do dentro do pacote.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de um sempre é referenciado no raiz.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a is always referenced from the root. Retornado URI é um caminho absoluto que sempre começa com "/" e está em conformidade com a sintaxe definida em de [especificações do Open Packaging convenções](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).The returned URI is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). A tabela a seguir ilustra os casos de exemplo para .The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`partUri`|O URI da parte retornadoReturned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |Picture1picture1.jpg|/picture1.jpg/picture1.jpg| |/picture2.jpg/picture2.jpg|/picture2.jpg/picture2.jpg| |a/mydoc.xamla/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml| |/b/bar.xaml/b/bar.xaml|/b/bar.xaml/b/bar.xaml| ## Examples O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o método para definir os URIs relativos de elementos.The following example shows how to use the method to define relative URIs for elements. [!code-csharp[PackageWrite#PackageWriteCreatePartUri](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageWrite/CSharp/PackageWrite.cs#packagewritecreateparturi)] [!code-vb[PackageWrite#PackageWriteCreatePartUri](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageWrite/visualbasic/packagewrite.vb#packagewritecreateparturi)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks normaliza `partUri` dobrando caso-em letras maiusculas () e retornando o resultado. normalizes `partUri` by case-folding to uppercase () and returning the result.

param.name: packUri
param.span: O URI "pack://" do qual retornar o URI do .

The URI of the from the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A tabela a seguir ilustra os casos de exemplo para .The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packUri`|URI de pacote retornadoReturned Package URI| |---------------|--------------------------| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.xyz| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?mypackage| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg| |pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpgpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc| |pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri GetPartUri (Uri packUri);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri GetPartUri(class System.Uri packUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetPartUri (packUri As Uri) As Uri
public: static Uri ^ GetPartUri(Uri ^ packUri);
static member GetPartUri : Uri -> Uri

param.name: packUri
param.span: O URI de pacote do qual retornar o URI.

span.span: The pack URI from which to return the URI.

summary.span: Retorna o URI de um dentro de um URI de pacote especificado.

span.span: Returns the URI of a within a specified pack URI.

returns.span: O URI do no determinado ou se apontar para um pacote, em vez de um .

span.span: The URI of the in the given , or if points to a package instead of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Retornado URI é relativo à raiz do pacote e é um caminho absoluto que sempre começa com "/" e está em conformidade com a sintaxe definida em de [especificações do Open Packaging convenções](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).The returned URI is relative to the package root and is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). A tabela a seguir ilustra os casos de exemplo para .The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packUri`|O URI da parte retornadoReturned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|nulonull| |pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpgpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|/a/picture.jpg/a/picture.jpg| |pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|

remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` deve identificar qualquer um de ("/") ou um que não é um parte.`partUri` must identify either the ("/") or a that is not a part. Para obter mais informações sobre partes, consulte a seção 9.3 "Relações" na disponível para download no empacotamento convenções de especificação aberta [especificações e Downloads de licença](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).For more information about parts, see Section 9.3 "Relationships" in the Open Packaging Conventions Specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples [URIs "pack://" no WPFPack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md) [Especificação do Open Packaging ConventionsOpen Packaging Conventions Specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)

exception.span: faz referência a uma parte da relação.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A tabela a seguir ilustra os casos de exemplo para .The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`sourcePartUri`|`targetPartUri`|Retornou um URI relativoReturned relative URI| |---------------------|---------------------|---------------------------| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg|picture.jpgpicture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|/mydoc/picture.jpg/mydoc/picture.jpg|../picture.jpg../picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|/mydoc/images/picture.jpg/mydoc/images/picture.jpg|../images/picture.jpg../images/picture.jpg|

exception.span: ou não tem uma sintaxe válida.

span.span: Either the or does not have a valid syntax.

param.name: relationshipPartUri
param.span: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] da parte da relação da qual o será retornado.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the relationship part to return the from.

summary.span: Retorna o do com um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] especificado.

span.span: Returns the from the with a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

returns.span: O do da relação com o especificado.

span.span: The of the from the relationship with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks O propriedade de uma parte de relação deve identificar qualquer um os ("/") ou um que não é um .The property of a relationship part must identify either the ("/") or a that is not a . Por exemplo, se a parte do pacote "/ files/document.xaml" é o proprietário da fonte da parte da relação "/ files/_rels/document.xaml.rels", chamando com o `relationshipPartUri` parâmetro de "/ files/_rels/document.xaml.rels" retorna a de "/ files/document.xaml".For example, if the package part "/files/document.xaml" is the source owner of the relationship part "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels", calling with the `relationshipPartUri` parameter of "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels" returns the of "/files/document.xaml".

exception.span: A sintaxe não é válida para um .

span.span: syntax is not valid for a .

exception.span: não faz referência a uma parte de relação.

span.span: does not reference a relationship part.

exception.span: O da parte da relação faz referência a outra parte da relação (inválido).

span.span: The of the relationship part references another relationship part (not valid).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri ResolvePartUri (Uri sourcePartUri, Uri targetUri);

public: static Uri ^ ResolvePartUri(Uri ^ sourcePartUri, Uri ^ targetUri);
static member ResolvePartUri : Uri * Uri -> Uri

param.name: sourcePartUri
param.span: O URI da parte de origem ou "/" para designar a raiz de .

span.span: The URI of the source part, or "/" to designate the root.

param.name: targetUri
param.span: O URI relativo à parte de destino.

span.span: The relative URI to the target part.

summary.span: Retorna o URI de uma parte, dado o URI da parte de origem e um URI com um caminho relativo para uma parte de destino.

span.span: Returns a part URI given a source part URI and a URI with a relative path to a target part.

returns.span: O URI da parte de destino resolvido entre os parâmetros e especificados.

span.span: The URI of the target part resolved between the specified and the parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A tabela a seguir ilustra os casos de exemplo para .The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`sourcePartUri`|`targetUri`|URI retornadoReturned URI| |---------------------|-----------------|------------------| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|picture.jpgpicture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|images/picture.jpgimages/picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/images/picture.jpg/mydoc/markup/images/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|./Picture.jpg./picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|../picture.jpg../picture.jpg|/mydoc/picture.jpg/mydoc/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|../images/picture.jpg../images/picture.jpg|/mydoc/images/picture.jpg/mydoc/images/picture.jpg| |/|images/picture.jpgimages/picture.jpg|/images/picture.jpg/images/picture.jpg| ## Examples O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o método .The following example shows how to use the method. Para o exemplo completo, consulte [lendo um exemplo de pacote](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160034).For the complete sample, see [Reading a Package Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160034).
